name: Impossible Jumpy Ball - Bounce and Switch
name_original: Impossible Jumpy Ball - Bounce and Switch
description:
Impossible Jumpy Ball is a challenging game where you have to avoid spikes, swords, axes and lasers. The difficulty continues to increase, making jumping over obstacles more difficult thus it one of the hardest games.
Features:
- Cool graphics
- Classic simple controls
- Extremely challenging, addictive and hard
- Suitable for all ages
- Free!
